name: Jumpscare - Halloween demo
description:
Your new apartment's rent was rather cheap. People say it's haunted, but is it?

Jumpscare is a game where you slowly uncover the mystery of an apartment you recently moved to. Explore your house, and do daily activities, there's a chance the ghost might be around. Is the ghost dangerous? Could be.

This is a Halloween DEMO. A rather short one at that. Doesn't feature a lot outside of a very brief part of the story, so it's rather linear too. It does feature some small stuff like a dress-up section.

Hope you enjoy it, more content will be added over time!
